title: We designed some Assignments for you to practice Please solve the Assignments and submit them

questions.questionText: Draw a flowchart for finding the biggest sum of two numbers in a given list.

title: I think you completed Assignment-1, Here is the next Assignment

questions.questionText: Draw a flowchart for finding the given string is in lexicographic order or not.

title: Assignment - 3This is the last Assignment in this Unit, Here is your Assignment-3

questions.questionText: Draw a flow chart for finding the minimum number in the list and swap that number with the first index element.
